title: Nuage Hayfever Relief Wipes, Resealable Pack
features: EFFECTIVE ALLERGEN REMOVAL: Removes pollen, dust & pet allergens from skin after outdoor activities, pet play or gardening, helping reduce irritation & keeping skin clear during allergy season.
FAMILY-FRIENDLY FORMULA: Gentle on sensitive skin & suitable for children, these hayfever wipes can be used throughout the day to cleanse face & hands without causing dryness or discomfort.
SOOTHING NATURAL OILS: Infused with peppermint & tea tree oil to cool & calm irritated skin—perfect after time spent outdoors or when seasonal allergy symptoms cause discomfort
CONVENIENT ON-THE-GO PACK: The resealable 30-wipe pack fits easily in cars, handbags, travel, gym & school bags, making it simple to stay allergen-free while out & about.
MULTIPURPOSE USE: Suitable for face & hands, these wet wipes are perfect in the garden, after trips to the park, petting animals, or fpr relief in a dusty environment.
BIODEGRADABLE & ECO-FRIENDLY: Made from biodegradable materials, these hand & face wipes offer a sustainable way to stay clean & fresh, with less impact on the planet.
RELIABLE HAYFEVER SUPPORT: Use to remove allergens before they cause uncomfortable irritating symptoms — ideal for hayfever & seasonal allergy relief.
DAILY ROUTINE: Make these wipes part of a daily skincare habit to help trap and remove everyday allergens, especially effective during high pollen months
REFRESHING SCENT: Lightly fragranced with natural oils to leave skin smelling clean & feeling instantly cool & refreshed, with no sticky residue.
ESSENTIAL SEASONAL SOLUTION: Keep a pack handy throughout spring & summer to manage symptoms quickly—ideal for school runs, commutes, or countryside walks.
description: Product Description Say goodbye to the irritation of seasonal allergies with Nuage Hayfever Relief Wipes – specially designed to remove and trap pollen, dust, and pet allergens from the skin. These gentle yet effective wet wipes are infused with refreshing peppermint and soothing tea tree oil, helping to keep hands and face feeling clean and calm. Ideal for daily use during high pollen seasons, each wipe offers a quick, cooling cleanse that provides comfort and relief. Whether after a walk in the park, a playdate with pets, or simply during a busy day outdoors, these hayfever wipes make staying allergen-free simple and convenient. Safe for children and suitable for sensitive skin, they’re perfect for the whole family to use on the go. The biodegradable material means they’re kind to the skin and to the planet, too. Compact and easy to carry, the resealable pack of 30 wipes fits easily into bags, glove compartments or school backpacks – making allergy control effortless, anytime and anywhere. Ingredients Aqua, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Ceteareth-12, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Phenoxyethanol, Ceteareth-20, Cetearyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Panthenol, PEG-10 Sorbitan Laurate, Glyceryl Stearate, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint), 2-Bromo-2-Nitropropane-1, 3-Diol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea TREE) Leaf Oil, Parfum, Citric Acid Directions Use the Nuage Hayfever Relief Wipes as needed to remove allergens from hands and face, suitable for use anywhere and at any time during the year. Safety Warning Suitable for daily use Manufacturer Contact Information Swirl Consumer Products (Ireland) Limited, Block 3, Harcourt Centre, Harcourt Road, Dublin 2, D02 A339, Ireland. See more
